label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hero kills base XP increased from 40 to 100

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hero kill last hit gold increased from 99 + 7.2 * Level to 120 + 8 * Level

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Assist gold rescaled from 45 + 0.033*NW to 30 + 0.038*NW

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Passive gold income increased from 85 to 95

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Bounty Runes are now reliable gold

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tower last hit bounty from 180 for T1/2/3/4 to 120/140/160/180

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral stacking support bounty increased from 35% to 40%

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Midlane creep camps changed from Medium to Small

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Removed Prowler Camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted the low ground tree layout near both outposts to prevent channeling from low ground without destroying trees first

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Removed a tree to make an opening in the tree line to the right of the mid radiant tier 1 tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Changed the camp to the right of the radiant secret shop from medium camp to hard camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Swapped the hard camp to the right of the radiant top tier 2 tower with the ancient camp in the primary jungle

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reduced the size of the Radiant safelane hard camp spawn box

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Radiant safelane small camp spawn box size has been increased

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dire safelane small camp spawn box size has been reduced

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Outposts can no longer be stolen by the other team until they kill one of your T2 towers

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Outpost now reveals enemies channeling it

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Outpost vision radius is now shown by holding alt

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All lane creeps now avoid hero aggro until they are near enemy creeps, neutrals or within 1550 range of their Tier 1 tower. This active * until the siege units spawn at 5 minutes.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Courier bounty reduced from 30 + 7/Level to 25 + 5/Level

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Courier flying upgrade level requirement reduced from 5 to 4

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Courier movement speed is reduced by 15% while carrying consumables

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Armor formula is now ( Armor * 0.06 / ( 1 + Armor * 0.06 )

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Armor per agility increased slightly from 0.16 to 1/6

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 1 Towers attack speed increased (attack rate from 1.0 to 0.9, and base attack speed from 100 to 110)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 1 Towers damage reduced from 110 to 90 (same overall DPS with above)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 2+ Towers attack speed increased (attack rate from 0.95 to 0.9, and base attack speed from 100 to 110)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Tier 2+ Towers damage reduced from 200 to 172 (same overall DPS with above)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Siege units health increased by 60

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All Pick drafting has been reworked. Each team now picks two heroes per round before they are revealed, rather than just one. The final round is a single selection. (So it goes from 1/1/1/1/1 to 2/2/1)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All Pick hero ban count increased from 10 to 12

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • All Pick first two rounds now have 5 extra seconds for hero picking

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captain's Mode ban count has changed from 4/1/1 for the three ban phases to 2/3/2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captain's Mode duration per pick and ban reduced from 35 seconds to 30

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captain's Mode first pick phase is changed from Radiant/Dire/Dire/Radiant to Radiant/Dire/Radiant/Dire (assuming Radiant is first pick)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Captain's Mode third ban phase is changed from Dire/Radiant to Radiant/Dire/Radiant/Dire

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random Draft hero pool reduced from 40 to 33

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Fountain now has a fury swipes style attacking, increasing its damage by 3 for each hit

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral Items nearby enemy range drop restriction increased from 900 to 1200

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral items will no longer drop if the nearby real hero source of kills is teleporting

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Neutral items no longer drop for Meepo clones if the Meepo prime is not nearby

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Lifesteal Amplification now stacks diminishingly rather than additively

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • HP Regen Amplification now stacks diminishingly rather than additively

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Heal Amplification now stacks diminishingly rather than additively

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Spell Lifesteal Amplification now stacks diminishingly rather than additively

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides Archer Aura (movement/attack speed of necro units increased with the same amount as the aura provided)
  • Attack damage type changed from Piercing to Hero and damage amount adjusted such that the net effect is -57% vs creeps, -10% vs buildings and +26% vs heroes
  • Mana regen reduced from 3/3.5/4 to 2/3/4
  • Last Will no longer deals damage through Spell Immunity

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides a damage and regen aura
  • Dominate now also gives the creep a buff that provides +40 Base Damage, +12 HP Regen and +4 MP Regen
  • Cooldown reduced from 60 to 45
  • Recipe is now Helm of Iron Will, Crown and a 725 gold recipe
  • Passive bonuses are now +6 Armor, +6 HP Regen and +6 All Stats

label: Vladmir's Offering
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires a Mask of Death, Blades of Attack, Ring of Basilius and a 600 gold recipe (total cost from 2300 to 2375)
  • No longer provides +3 Armor Aura
  • No longer provides +5 All Stats
  • Lifesteal Aura reduced from 20% to 15%
  • Now provides +18% Damage Aura
  • Mana regen increased from 1.5 to 2

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires Crown, Sage's Mask, Windlace and 600 gold recipe
  • No longer provides a 20 Attack Speed Aura
  • Now provides +6 All Attributes, +1.5 Mana Regen and +20 Movement Speed Bonus
  • Attack speed bonus increased from +35 to +45
  • Active movement speed increased from 12% to 13%

label: Buckler
descriptionHtml:
• Armor aura reduced from 2.5 to 2
  • Recipe cost reduced from 225 to 200 (total price remains 375)

label: Mekansm
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires Buckler instead of Chainmail (total cost remains same)
  • Now Provides +3 Armor Aura
  • Self armor reduced from +6 to +4
  • No longer provides +4 All stats

label: Guardian Greaves
descriptionHtml:
• Now provides +3 Armor Aura
  • No longer provides +5 All stats
  • Self armor reduced from +6 to +4

label: Crimson Guard
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +3 All Stats
  • Cooldown reduced from 46 to 40

label: Blade Mail
descriptionHtml:
• Now has a 500 gold recipe instead of using Robe of the Magi
  • No longer grants +8Intelligence
  • Armor bonus increased from 6 to 7
  • Now has a passive component that returns 20 + 20% of the attack damage
  • Active return damage reduced from 100% to 80%

label: Blitz Knuckles
descriptionHtml: • New basic item. Costs 1000 gold and provides +35 Attack Speed.

label: Monkey King Bar
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires Blitz Knuckles instead of Quarterstaff
  • Damage reduced from 52 to 42
  • Attack speed increased from +10 to +35

label: Oblivion Staff
descriptionHtml: • Bonus damage increased from 10 to 15

label: Orchid Malevolence
descriptionHtml:
• Mana regen reduced from 5.5 to 4
  • Intelligencereduced from 25 to 20
  • Recipe cost reduced from 775 to 475 (total cost reduced from 3875 to 3475)

label: Shadow Amulet
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 1400 to 1000

label: Glimmer Cape
descriptionHtml: • Now combines from Shadow Amulet, Cloak and Gloves of Haste

label: Shadow Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Now combines from Shadow Amulet, Blitz Knuckles and Broadsword
  • Attack Speed increased from 30 to 35
  • Damage reduced from 27 to 25

label: Echo Sabre
descriptionHtml: • Slow is now only applied by real heroes

label: Silver Edge
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires Echo Sabre instead of Ultimate Orb
  • Now provides +40 Damage, +35 Attack Speed, +12Strength, +10Intelligenceand +1.5 Mana Regen (keeps the other benefits from components)

label: Bracer
descriptionHtml:
• Strength/Intelligence/Agilityreduced from 6/3/3 to 5/2/2
  • No longer grants +4% Magic Resistance
  • Now grants +3 Damage and +0.75 HP Regen

label: Wraith Band
descriptionHtml:
• Strength/Intelligence/Agilityreduced from 3/3/6 to 2/2/5
  • Now grants +1.5 Armor and +5 Attack Speed

label: Null Talisman
descriptionHtml:
• Strength/Intelligence/Agilityreduced from 3/6/3 to 2/5/2
  • Now grants +0.6 Mana Regen and +3% Spell Amp

label: Ring of Regen
descriptionHtml:
• Health regen reduced from 1.75 to 1.5
  • Cost reduced from 225 to 175

label: Sage's Mask
descriptionHtml:
• Mana regen reduced from 1 to 0.6
  • Cost reduced from 225 to 175

label: Ring of Protection
descriptionHtml: • Cost increased from 150 to 175

label: Ring of Basilius
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 200 to 250 (total price remains 425)

label: Headdress
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 200 to 250 (total price remains 425)

label: Urn of Shadows
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 310 to 335 (total price remains 840)

label: Pipe of Insight
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 1200 to 1250 (total cost remains 3425)

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Unbroken speed reduced from 75 to 70 (total cost was reduced from 975 to 925)
  • Broken speed reduced from 50 to 45 (total cost was reduced from 975 to 925)

label: Kaya
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +12% Mana Loss Reduction
  • Now provides +24% Mana Regen Amplification
  • Now provides 24% Spell Lifesteal Amplification

label: Yasha and Kaya
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +18% Mana Loss Reduction
  • Now provides +30% Mana Regen Amplification
  • Spell Amp increased from 14% to 16%
  • Now provides 30% Spell Lifesteal Amplification

label: Kaya and Sange
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +18% Mana Loss Reduction
  • Now provides +30% Mana Regen Amplification
  • Spell Amp increased from 14% to 16%
  • Now provides 30% Spell Lifesteal Amplification

label: BloodStone
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +12% Mana Loss Reduction
  • Now provides 30% Spell Lifesteal Amplification
  • Now provides +10% Magic Resistance
  • Cooldown reduced from 250 to 85

label: Sange
descriptionHtml: • No longer provides Spell Lifesteal Amplification (same for its upgrades)

label: Soul Booster
descriptionHtml: • Now provides +10% Magic Resistance

label: Octarine Core
descriptionHtml:
• Now provides +10% Magic Resistance
  • Now requires Soul Booster, Voodoo Mask and 900 recipe cost (Total cost reduced from 5900 to 5000)
  • No longer provides bonusIntelligence

label: Voodoo Mask
descriptionHtml: • New base item. Grants +12% Spell Lifesteal (2.5% against creeps). Costs 900 Gold.

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml:
• Attributes reduced from +9 to +4
  • Recipe cost reduced from 1150 to 650
  • Cooldown increased from 20 to 25
  • Spell amplification reduced from 20% to 18%

label: Holy Locket
descriptionHtml: • Can now target allied units with the magic stick active. Cast Range 500

label: Soul Ring
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires 2x Gauntlet, Ring of Protection, and a 350 gold recipe (same total cost)
  • Now provides +6Strengthand +2 Armor
  • No longer provides +2.25 HP Regen

label: Hyperstone
descriptionHtml: • Attack speed bonus increased from 55 to 60

label: Assault Cuirass
descriptionHtml:
• Attack speed aura bonus increased from +25 to +30
  • No longer provides +5 All Stats

label: Bloodthorn
descriptionHtml: • Attack speed increased from 85 to 90

label: Battle Fury
descriptionHtml:
• Now requires Claymore instead of Mithril Hammer
  • Damage reduced from 60 to 55
  • Mana regen reduced from 3.75 to 3.25

label: Broadsword
descriptionHtml: • Damage reduced from 16 to 15

label: Crystalys
descriptionHtml:
• Damage reduced from 34 to 32
  • Recipe cost reduced from 700 to 500

label: Cloak
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 550 to 450

label: Hood of Defiance
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost increased from 200 to 300 (total cost remains the same)

label: Satanic
descriptionHtml: • Now has a 500 gold recipe

label: Meteor Hammer
descriptionHtml:
• Cooldown reduced from 28 to 24
  • Stun duration reduced from 2 to 1.75
  • Recipe now Perseverance, Crown and 200 gold recipe
  • Now provides +8 All Stats, +6.5 Health Regen and +2.5 Mana Regen

label: Spirit Vessel
descriptionHtml:
• No longer has a heal reduction aura
  • Soul Release regen increased from 30 to 40
  • Soul Release dps increased from 25 to 35
  • Enemy HP regen reduction increased from -35% to -45%

label: Shiva's Guard
descriptionHtml:
• Freezing Aura now also applies a 25% heal reduction in the area
  • Recipe cost increased from 650 to 750

label: Dagon
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe now Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, Robe of the Magi and 1300 recipe
  • Now provides +6/8/10/12/14 All Attributes
  • Recipe cost increased from 1250 to 1300

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml:
• No longer provides +10 Health Regen nor heal/regen amplification
  • Now passively provides 1% health regeneration
  • While out of combat, provides +50% health regen amplification
  • Strengthreduced from +45 to +40
  • Recipe cost increased from 400 to 650

label: Eye of Skadi
descriptionHtml:
• Heal reduction increased from 35% to 40%
  • Slow from 20/45 to 25/50

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 150 to 130
  • Melee bonus damage reduced from 18 to 15
  • Range bonus damage increased from 5 to 6

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 1200 to 900

label: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Cast range reduced from 600 to 550

label: Heaven's Halberd
descriptionHtml: • Evasion reduced from 25% to 20%

label: Dragon Lance
descriptionHtml: • Agilityincreased from 12 to 14

label: Hand of Midas
descriptionHtml: • XP multiplier increased from 185% to 210%

label: Refresher Orb
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 195 to 180

label: Ultimate Orb
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 2150 to 2050

label: Infused Raindrops
descriptionHtml: • Mana regen reduced from 0.9 to 0.8

label: Nullifier
descriptionHtml: • Projectile speed increased from 750 to 1000

label: Aghanim's Blessing
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 1800 to 1600

label: Aether Lens
descriptionHtml: • Recipe cost reduced from 600 to 550

label: Boots of Travel
descriptionHtml: • Reduces the cooldown from 40 to 30

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 80 to 50

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml: • Replenish cooldown reduced from 90 to 85

label: Tome of Knowledge
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 150 to 75

label: Gloves of Haste
descriptionHtml: • Moved from Miscellaneous shop category to Equipment with the other attack speed items

label: Mango Tree
descriptionHtml:
• Pickup range for mangoes is changed from the default 150 to 300
  • Now has a minimap icon
  • No longer drops if another consumable item has dropped in the same tier

label: Iron Talon
descriptionHtml: • Active damage reduced from 50% to 40%

label: Royal Jelly
descriptionHtml: • No longer drops if another consumable item has dropped in the same tier

label: Broom Handle
descriptionHtml: • Attack range increased from +35 to +50

label: Faded Broach
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed reduced from 25 to 20

label: Arcane Ring
descriptionHtml: • Armor reduced from +3 to +2

label: Vampire Fangs
descriptionHtml: • Night vision increased from 250 to 300

label: Philosopher's Stone
descriptionHtml: • Damage reduction reduced from -35 to -30

descriptionHtml: • Cooldown increased from 20 to 25

label: Clumsy Net
descriptionHtml:
• Cast range reduced from 650 to 600
  • +6 All Stats to +5

label: Greater Faerie Fire
descriptionHtml:
• No longer drops if another consumable item has dropped in the same tier
  • Damage increased from 35 to 40

label: Repair Kit
descriptionHtml:
• No longer drops if another consumable item has dropped in the same tier
  • Now has a 60 second cooldown
  • Health regen increased from +20 to +25

label: Spider Legs
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown increased from 10 to 12

label: Enchanted Quiver
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed it granting a permanent +400 range for Tempest Double

descriptionHtml:
• Armor reduction from -5 to -4
  • Slow from 20/10% to 25/15%

label: Mind Breaker
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 20 to 15

descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased from +16% to +20%
  • Status Resistance reduced from +16% to +12%

descriptionHtml:
• Damage increased from 17 to 20

  • Greater Healing amplifications reduced from 17% to 14%

label: Prince's Knife
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 12 to 10

label: Flicker
descriptionHtml:
• Now has a minimum 200 range blink
  • Max range reduced from 450 to 400

label: Illusionist's Cape
descriptionHtml: • Illusion incoming damage increased from 150% to 200%

label: Havoc Hammer
descriptionHtml:
• Impact radius increased from 350 to 400
  • Impact base damage increased from 225 to 275

label: Magic Lamp
descriptionHtml: • Heal increased from 300 to 400

label: Pirate Hat
descriptionHtml:
• No longer steals gold on kills
  • Can be activated to dig for bounty runes with 100% success rate. Cooldown 40
